name: Page Load Validation
description: Verify the main page loads correctly
steps: Wait for page to fully load
expected_result: Page loads without errors and shows expected content

name: Successful Login
description: Verify successful login with valid credentials
expected_result: User is redirected to the products page

name: Failed Login - Incorrect Password
description: Verify error message with incorrect password

name: Failed Login - Locked Out User
description: Verify error message with locked out user

name: Login Form Validation - Empty Fields
description: Verify error message with empty username and password

name: Responsive Design - Mobile View
description: Verify layout adapts to mobile screen size
steps: Resize browser window to simulate mobile screen
Verify all elements are visible and functional
expected_result: Layout adapts correctly to mobile view

name: Visual Elements - Correct Images
steps: Check all images on login and products page

name: Page Load Time
description: Measure page load time for login page
steps: Use browser developer tools to measure load time
expected_result: Load time is within acceptable range (e.g., under 3 seconds)

name: Keyboard Navigation
steps: Navigate through login form using only tab key
Verify ability to submit form using Enter key
expected_result: All elements are accessible via keyboard

name: Screen Reader Compatibility
steps: Use a screen reader to navigate the login page
Verify all elements are correctly announced
expected_result: Screen reader announces all elements correctly

name: Login Form - Input Validation - Username Length
description: Verify input validation for username field length
steps: Enter a username exceeding the maximum allowed length
expected_result: An appropriate error message is displayed, preventing submission.

name: Login Form - Input Validation - Special Characters
description: Verify input validation for special characters in username
steps: Enter a username containing special characters (!@#$%^&*)
expected_result: The form either accepts the input or displays an appropriate error message.

name: XSS Prevention - Username Field
description: Check for Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in username field
expected_result: The script should not execute; the input should be sanitized.

name: XSS Prevention - Password Field
description: Check for Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in password field
expected_result: The script should not execute; the input should be sanitized.

name: Authentication - Session Management
description: Verify session management after successful login
steps: Check if the user is still logged in
expected_result: The user should be logged out after closing and reopening the browser.
